title: World's Finals Viewing Party in Brisbane?
body: I'm going to be in Brisbane during the time the world finals were happening. Is there any places that may be hosting a viewing party during that time?

replies.body:
As far as I'm aware there are no plans for any official viewing parties this year. 

There may be some public ones through facebook and such in places like Brisbane City, but obviously use discretion with those privately run events.

Would like to know too but for NZ

Was expecting a post like this 

https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/watch-worlds-final-hoyts
it's because the timing is too late for the cinemas unfortunately
